scene_description_enriched: The image depicts Saint Paul, identified by the inscription "S. paL.". He is shown standing, holding a book in his left arm and a sword upright in his right hand. He wears a red tunic and a blue mantle, and has a halo indicating sainthood. The background features a red curtain with gold patterns, suggesting an interior setting, and a green ground. The scene is framed within an ornate, gilded border with foliate motifs.
